Vehicle.Name: I-C4a Combat Construction Droid
Vehicle.Description: [H3]I-C4a Combat Construction Droid[h3] Please see page 56 of the Fully Operational Sourcebook for details.

Mod.MiscDesc: [B]Tracked:[b] Treats any terrain as if it were one step lower in difficulty.

[B]Construction in the Field:[b] Can be used to fashion crude defense structures, fortifications, and other constructions. Droid brain must make a [B]Hard([DI][DI][DI]) Mechanics check[b]. These structures provide cover for up to 20 characters and adds [SE][SE] to Ranged combat checks made against them.
